author: Staff Reporter
text:
Congress MLA J.G. Prince representing Colachel constituency urged the State government to operate special buses to Kumbakonam for Mahamaham festival.

In a statement issued here on Sunday, he said that pilgrims from nook and corner of the country would throng for the festival on February 16.

They would also visit Rameswaram and Kanyakumari. Hence, the TNSTC Tirunelveli Region should operate special buses from Kanyakumari to Kumbakonam, Rameswaram Thiruvananthapuram.
title: “Operate special buses for Mahamaham”
